name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: This records identifiers associated with this allergy/intolerance concern that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

name: $addidentifier
desc: This records identifiers associated with this allergy/intolerance concern that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this allergy/intolerance concern that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / print

name: $clinicalStatus
desc: Returns: The clinical status of the allergy or intolerance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The clinical status of the allergy or intolerance.

name: $verificationStatus
desc: Returns: Assertion about certainty associated with the propensity, or potential risk, of a reaction to the identified substance (including pharmaceutical product).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Assertion about certainty associated with the propensity, or potential risk, of a reaction to the identified substance (including pharmaceutical product).

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for the reaction risk.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for the reaction risk.

name: $category
desc: Returns: Category of the identified substance.

name: $criticality
desc: Returns: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of the reaction to the identified substance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of the reaction to the identified substance.

name: $code
desc: Returns: Code for an allergy or intolerance statement (either a positive or a negated/excluded statement).  This may be a code for a substance or pharmaceutical product that is considered to be responsible for the adverse reaction risk (e.g., "Latex"), an allergy or intolerance condition (e.g., "Latex allergy"), or a negated/excluded code for a specific substance or class (e.g., "No latex allergy") or a general or categorical negated statement (e.g.,  "No known allergy", "No known drug allergies").

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Code for an allergy or intolerance statement (either a positive or a negated/excluded statement).  This may be a code for a substance or pharmaceutical product that is considered to be responsible for the adverse reaction risk (e.g., "Latex"), an allergy

name: $patient
desc: Returns: The patient who has the allergy or intolerance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The patient who has the allergy or intolerance.

name: $assertedDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the existance of the AllergyIntolerance was first asserted or acknowledged.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the existance of the AllergyIntolerance was first asserted or acknowledged.

name: $recorder
desc: Returns: Individual who recorded the record and takes responsibility for its content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Individual who recorded the record and takes responsibility for its content.

name: $asserter
desc: Returns: The source of the information about the allergy that is recorded.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The source of the information about the allergy that is recorded.

name: $lastOccurrence
desc: Returns: Represents the date and/or time of the last known occurrence of a reaction event.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Represents the date and/or time of the last known occurrence of a reaction event.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Additional narrative about the propensity for the Adverse Reaction, not captured in other fields.

name: $addnote
desc: Additional narrative about the propensity for the Adverse Reaction, not captured in other fields.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Additional narrative about the propensity for the Adverse Reaction, not captured in other fields.

name: $reaction
desc: Returns: Details about each adverse reaction event linked to exposure to the identified substance.

name: $addreaction
desc: Details about each adverse reaction event linked to exposure to the identified substance.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Details about each adverse reaction event linked to exposure to the identified substance.
